entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 10:59 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:59 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
